lead_paragraph: Kris Bryant singled sharply to left field with no outs in the seventh inning Saturday for the Chicago Cubs' first hit off the Seattle Mariners' Wade Miley.

headline.print_headline: Bryant Singles to Stop Miley's No-Hit Bid
headline.main: Bryant Singles to Stop Miley's No-Hit Bid

snippet: Kris Bryant singled sharply to left field with no outs in the seventh inning Saturday for the Chicago Cubs' first hit off the Seattle Mariners' Wade Miley....
